member.name: PlayerInGameDto
member.summary: Represents a player participating in a chess game, containing their name, connection ID, and time reserve.

member.name: MoveDto
member.summary: Represents a move in chess, including the starting and ending positions, as well as optional promotion for pawns.

member.name: GameResultDto
member.summary: Represents the result of a chess game, including the game ID, the names and Elo ratings of the winner and loser.

member.name: ChatMessageDto
member.summary: Represents a chat message sent during the game, containing the author and the message text.

member.name: MoveResultDto
member.summary: Represents the result of a move in the chess game, indicating whether it was successful and providing a message.

member.name: MoveResultDto.Success
member.summary: Creates a successful move result with a provided message.
member.param: The success message to be returned.
member.returns: A `MoveResultDto` with `IsSuccess` set to `true` and the provided message.

member.name: MoveResultDto.Error
member.summary: Creates an error move result with a provided message.
member.param: The error message to be returned.
member.returns: A `MoveResultDto` with `IsSuccess` set to `false` and the provided message.
